title: Aid the Underduke
content:
Sharess' Caress. Nine Fingers, leader of the city's criminal Guild, is having her territory threatened by a new player on the scene: The Stone Lord. We should head to the Guildhall to find out more.

Help Jaheira find Minsc

Search for the Stone Lord

Find the Stone Lord at Counting House

Two drunken Guild members let slip that Nine-Fingers plans to ambush the Stone Lord at the city's Counting House. We need to get there first if we want to save. We found a note indicating that Nine-Figers plan
